abstracts.cdata!:
The Second State Pension Reform
            Technical Assistance Loan (TAL) Project for Brazil will
            upgrade state pension management (public officials'
            pension system for civil servants) thereby significantly
            reducing unwarranted pension claims, improving financial
            sustainability, strengthening state and federal
            institutions, and building reform constituencies. The
            restructuring designates the minister of social security as
            the Borrower's representative for disbursement purposes
            under Section 2.02. of article ii of the loan agreement.
            This change is based on a request received from PGFN
            (Procuradoria-Geral da Fazenda Nacional) to facilitate
            project disbursements.  The minister of finance will
            continue as the Borrower's representative under the loan.
